title: vtrace / vivisect resources
content:
Where can I find some resources to start learning about vivisect? 
Blog posts, presentations, PDFs, code examples, anything would be appreciated.

I am aware I can read the code but before doing that I would like to have something to get me started.

comments.text: Mandiant had a decent blog post on it a while back. mandiant.com/blog/custom-vdb-debugger-exploit-analysis

answers_data.content:
There's a nice blog entry on it here: http://www.singlehop.com/blog/binary-vivisection-part-1/

You can also see the README file here, and some related scripts here.
